sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_act_script_2bcc32fb13864f80cb92b7a66144b01d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_act_script"><sys_push_notif_act_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Assign to me? - Yes</name><script><![CDATA[(function runAction(/*Optional GlideRecord*/ current) {
	
	if (current.getTableName() == "x_ahho_movable_med_request" && current.assigned_to == '') {
		current.comments = "Self assigned";
		current.assigned_to = gs.getUserID();
		current.update();
	}
})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_act_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hsgill</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-02 17:43:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2bcc32fb13864f80cb92b7a66144b01d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assign to me? - Yes</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_act_script_2bcc32fb13864f80cb92b7a66144b01d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hsgill</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-03 18:48:25</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_act_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_msg_content_468cbabb13864f80cb92b7a66144b092
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_msg_content"><sys_push_notif_msg_content action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Two Button Option (Yes/No)</name><push_app display_value="ServiceNow Mobile Application">ab704041ff1102009738ffffffffff33</push_app><script><![CDATA[(function buildJSON(/*GlideRecord*/ current, /*String*/ message, /*Object*/ attributes) {

    var json = {};

    json = {
        "aps" : {
            "sound" : "default",
            "category" : "yes_no_background"
        },
        "record" : {
            "table" : current.getTableName(),
            "sys_id" : current.sys_id
        },
        "scripts" : {"yes_background" : "2bcc32fb13864f80cb92b7a66144b01d",
                     "no_background" : "4f4dbebb13864f80cb92b7a66144b08c" }
    };

    return json;

})(current, message, attributes);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hsgill</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-02 17:41:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>468cbabb13864f80cb92b7a66144b092</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Two Button Option (Yes/No)</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_msg_content_468cbabb13864f80cb92b7a66144b092</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hsgill</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-09 20:32:06</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_msg_content></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_push_notif_act_script_4f4dbebb13864f80cb92b7a66144b08c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_push_notif_act_script"><sys_push_notif_act_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Assign to me? - No</name><script><![CDATA[(function runAction(/*Optional GlideRecord*/ current) {

 gs.log(gs.getUser() + " ignored this record: " + current.number);
 //writes a message to the system log that the user ignored this incident.
})(current);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_push_notif_act_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hsgill</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-02 17:43:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4f4dbebb13864f80cb92b7a66144b08c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assign to me? - No</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_push_notif_act_script_4f4dbebb13864f80cb92b7a66144b08c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hsgill</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-02 17:43:41</sys_updated_on></sys_push_notif_act_script></record_update>
